trans-unit.source: Defines a specialized text run that is used to mark the end of a paragraph.
trans-unit.target: Define uma execução de texto especializado usado para marcar o final de um parágrafo.

trans-unit.source: The text engine client can use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfParagraph> class to create a custom paragraph-break representation.
trans-unit.target: O cliente do mecanismo de texto pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfParagraph> classe para criar uma representação de quebra de parágrafo personalizado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfParagraph" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfParagraph" />.

trans-unit.source: The number of characters in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfParagraph" /> buffer.
trans-unit.target: O número de caracteres no buffer <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfParagraph" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfParagraph" /> class using a specified character length.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfParagraph" /> usando um comprimento de caracteres especificado.

trans-unit.source: The number of characters in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfParagraph" /> buffer.
trans-unit.target: O número de caracteres no buffer <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfParagraph" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties" /> value to use for the characters in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfParagraph" /> buffer.
trans-unit.target: O valor <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties" /> a ser usado para os caracteres no buffer <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfParagraph" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfParagraph" /> class using a specified character length and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties" /> value.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfParagraph" /> usando um comprimento de caracteres especificado e um valor <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties" />.
